name: Totem (itch) (TheOddPotion)
description:
There used to be working Totems everywhere. They allowed transportation to every corner of the world and though the world was vast and expansive the Totems made it feel so small....

That was eons ago. Now most of the Totems are not awake. Go, activate the Totems. We shall reclaim this world again.

[CONTROLS]
Arrows: Move
Space: Activate Totem

[TOOLS USED]
Phaser.io
Sublime Text 3
Gimp & MSPaint
LMMS & Audacity
Tiled Map Editor
